author: Benjamin Njiri
title: Denmark to ban Bitcoin wallets? Here's all you need to know! - AMBCrypto
text: []https://ambcrypto.com/pepe-bides-its-time-near-key-support-can-it-reverse-the-losses-since-may/ News Denmark to ban Bitcoin wallets? Here’s all you need to know! - Denmark reportedly planning to regulate self-custody wallets and other ‘DeFi interfaces’. - Denmark’s plans don’t mirror MiCA’s guidelines and US treatment of BTC self-custody wallets. Self-custodial wallets, which are common with [Bitcoin [BTC]]https://ambcrypto.com/category/bitcoin-news, could face regulation in Denmark. Reacting to recent DeFi guidance by the Danish FSA (Financial Supervisory Authority), Mikko Ohtamaa of Trading Protocol noted , ‘In the latest DeFi guidance of Danish FSA, the regulator goes too far: The guidance tries to capture everything in crypto regulation, including your Bitcoin wallet, using the “interface” argument.’ Ohtamaa added that the interface thesis could affect everything, including Bitcoin wallet service providers. ‘You do not need to think about it too hard to realise that everything is an interface: your computer, your web browser, your Bitcoin wallet, Uniswap website, and so on.’ Will Denmark’s plans affect Bitcoin? DFSA’s possible move was based on the ‘perceived gap’ in the EU’s MiCA (Markets in Crypto Assets) regulation, which would go live on 30th December, 2024. The MiCA regulations don’t apply to decentralized finance. Ohtamaa slammed DFSA and noted that if its proposal were adopted, offering BTC wallets in Denmark could be challenging. ‘What this means is that no one can offer Bitcoin wallets, DEX interfaces, or anything that touches a token to Danish anymore because they would need to be regulated in Denmark.’ Although Estonia reportedly took a similar route on self-custodial wallets, the same was recently rejected in the US. In March, claims against Coinbase Wallet were dropped in the SEC vs. Coinbase lawsuit, reinforcing a win for self-custody wallets in the US. ‘Significant setback for SEC w/ Judge Failla granting Coinbase’s motion to dismiss SEC’s claim that Coinbase acted as a broker by offering non-custodial digital wallet software.SEC aimed to discourage builders from developing peer-to-peer software. Didn’t work’ Additionally, the recently passed US crypto infrastructure bill, FIT21 Act, opted to study DeFi, like MiCA, instead of regulating it. That said, DFSA is currently calling for feedback from private actors. However, it remains to be seen how DFSA will improve and adopt the proposals on DeFi. Adopting the DFSA proposal, as it is, per Ohtamaa, could negatively affect those offering self-custody Bitcoin wallet services in Denmark, whether through apps or web browsers.

title: Ураган снес половину села в Омской области 17 июля 2025 года: видео
text:
В селе Петровка Омской области ураганный ветер, о котором ранее предупреждали синоптики, сорвал кровлю с одного из жилых домов. В результате были повреждены газопровод и опоры линии электропередачи, что привело к отключению газа и электричества. Об этом сообщила руководитель пресс-службы главного управления МЧС по региону Юлия Дойникова.
«С одного дома сорвало крышу, ею повредило газопровод (пять домов отключено) и столбы линий электропередачи (пять домов отключено). Идут восстановительные работы», — заявила Дойникова для ТАСС.
Ранее метеорологи предупреждали жителей области о скором наступлении непогоды, в том числе о ливнях с грозами и порывистым ветром, скорость которого местами достигала более 25 метров в секунду. Местные жители разместили в соцсетях фото и видео последствий стихии. На этих материалах зафиксированы повреждения кровли хозяйственных построек и снесенные ветром заборы.

author: David
title: Audi R8 Spyder Specs: The Ultimate Driving Experience
text:
2017 Audi R8 Spyder First Drive, Review, Specs, Details Likeautomotive from likeautomotive.com The Audi R8 Spyder is the latest addition to the Audi family of luxury sports cars. It is a mid-engined two-door convertible sports car with a sleek, sporty design and powerful engine. The R8 Spyder was revealed at the 2017 Frankfurt Motor Show and has been in production since 2018. The R8 Spyder is powered by a 5.2-litre V10 engine that produces 540 horsepower and 398 lb-ft of torque. The engine is mated to a seven-speed S-Tronic dual-clutch transmission that sends power to all four wheels.
The Audi R8 Spyder has a top speed of 199 mph and can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in just 3.5 seconds. It also has an impressive fuel economy rating of 19 mpg in the city and 28 mpg on the highway. The R8 Spyder has a curb weight of 4,255 lbs and is available with either a manual or automatic transmission. It has a base price of $169,900 and comes with a wide range of features, including a Bang & Olufsen audio system, adaptive cruise control, and a rearview camera.
Table of Contents
Exterior Design The exterior of the Audi R8 Spyder is designed to be both sporty and luxurious. The car features an aluminum frame with carbon fiber panels and a fabric top. The car also has a low, sleek profile and aggressive styling. The car comes with 19-inch alloy wheels and LED headlights. The car also has a wide variety of exterior colors to choose from, including Daytona Gray, Ibis White, and Mythos Black.
Interior Design The interior of the Audi R8 Spyder is designed to be both comfortable and luxurious. The car comes with leather upholstery, heated and ventilated front seats, and a 12.3-inch infotainment system. The car also has a virtual cockpit, a head-up display, and a 7.0-inch touch screen. The car also has a variety of interior colors to choose from, including black, brown, and red.
Safety Features The Audi R8 Spyder comes with a variety of safety features, including a rearview camera, lane keep assist, adaptive cruise control, and automatic emergency braking. The car also has several airbags and a tire pressure monitoring system. The car also comes with a blind spot monitoring system, which alerts the driver if there is another vehicle in the car’s blind spot.
Conclusion The Audi R8 Spyder is a luxurious and powerful sports car. It has a sleek and sporty design, a powerful V10 engine, and a variety of safety features. The car is also available with a variety of exterior and interior colors. If you are looking for a luxurious and powerful sports car, then the Audi R8 Spyder is an excellent choice.
Source: www.caradvice.com.au Source: www.dailyrevs.com Source: likeautomotive.com Source: hdqwalls.com Source: www.caradvice.com.au Source: darkoncars.blogspot.com Source: carbuzz.com

title: Ground News - Caught on camera: Porch pirate sought by Miramar police
text:
Summary by Ground News Miramar police released surveillance video of the culprit Thursday. Police identified the culprit as Derrick Robinson. Robinson was seen in several videos from different homes, walking up to the front door and grabbing multiple packages. Police have also released a video of who they believe was Robinson's driver.
